attributes.action: do everything in his power to keep the British Grand Prix at Silverstone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heart 96.6 wants to see an end to the shambolic situation regarding the British Grand Prix. Record crowds at Silverstone show it's the perfect venue for Formula 1 and moving the event away from Northamptonshire will threaten hundreds of jobs and jeopardise the local economy.
